mapper.select: SELECT sum(amount) FROM user_money_log WHERE status = 1 AND finish_time >= #{startTime} AND finish_time < #{endTime}
SELECT count(*) FROM user_product WHERE status = 1 AND buy_time >= #{startTime} AND buy_time < #{endTime}
SELECT count(*) FROM security_baoquan_log WHERE status = 1 AND success_time >= #{startTime} AND success_time < #{endTime}
SELECT count(*) FROM apitest_authorization WHERE status = 'VERIFIED' AND valid_time >= #{startTime} AND valid_time < #{endTime}
